name: DAQ Lord of Idar
overview: Idar is a region on the island of Daq, somewhere in Earth’s history. When a lord (or land lord) of Idar knows he’s soon about to pass away, a new lord will have to be chosen. This is done by means of an old game, to be played by the lord’s house. In the shape of a traditional board game, four aspiring land lords strive for the honorable title of lord. It’s a fierce battle where the dice will point out the winner.
